title: 82/262/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 April 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'PHI - Auger electron spectrometer, model 5000, consisting of : - cylindrical - Auger electron optics, model 10-155 ; - Auger spectroscopy electronics system, model 50-510 ; - multiplex control, model 20-055 ; X-Y recorder, model 18-020 ; - Sputter ion gun, model 04-161 and - Sputter ion gun control, model 20-045' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 1 April 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'PHI - Auger electron spectrometer, model 5000, consisting of: - cylindrical - Auger electron optics, model 10-155; - Auger spectroscopy electronics system, model 50-510; - multiplex control, model 20-055; X-Y recorder, model 18-020; - Sputter ion gun, model 04-161 and - Sputter ion gun control, model 20-045' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/262/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'PHI - Auger electron spectrometer, model 5000, consisting of: - cylindrical - Auger electron optics, model 10-155; - Auger spectroscopy electronics system, model 50-510; - multiplex control, model 20-055; X-Y recorder, model 18-020; - Sputter ion gun, model 04-161 and - Sputter ion gun control, model 20-045', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 24 September 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 April 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
